result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Eric  Valadez in court with attorney Julia Marie May.  Haley Jo Johnson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Spanish Interpreter, Bruce Goodman appeared with the defendant's mother. Court in session @ 9:03 a.m. Appearances made. Matter before the Court for sentencing on file 2015CF000020.  File 2015CF000177 was dismissed and read-in.  Court hears argument of Attorneys and sentences the defendant in file 2015CF000020.
Application for Jail Time Credit form
Defendant Eric  Valadez in court with attorney Julia Marie May.  Haley Jo Johnson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed.  Further proceedings scheduled for January 27, 2017 at 09:00 am.
BOND QUASHED on file 2015CF000177
Atty Julia May

HEARD OFF COURT RECORD:  
Present in Court were DA Daniel Necci, Attys Travis Schwantes and Julia May and the Defendant, Eric Valadez
This case was scheduled for FPT today and a JT on Monday and Tuesday of next week - July 11 and 12.  
This case has been bumped from the trial calendar by another case being tried on these same dates.
FPT and JT have been rescheduled to new dates.
FPT on October 12, 2016 at 2:30 pm - before Judge Drettwan
JT on October 17 and 18, 2016 at 8:30 am - before Judge Drettwan

HEARD OFF THE COURT RECORD:  This matter was on the Court's calendar for a Final pre-trial.  Attorneys and Defendant were present in Court.  This case was scheduled for Jury Trial next week Monday and Tuesday but has been bumped from the trial calendar by another case being tried.  FPT rescheduled to July 7, 2016 at 2:30 p.m.  JURY TRIAL rescheduled to July 11 and 12, 2016 at 8:30 am   (df)
Sheriff's Invoice #15-1404 - $160.00

Defendant Eric  Valadez in court with attorney Travis Schwantes.  Diane M. Donohoo appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Minutes filed.  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 17, 2016 at 02:30 pm.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for February 22, 2016 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Eric Valadez
Current: 405 Pine St, Delavan, WI 53115 United States  (Effective: 10-08-2015)
Prior: 405 Pine Street, Delavan, WI 53115
Signed bond filed with the court.

MUST BE CO-SIGNED BY RAUL VALADEZ.
TOTAL BOND COVERS 15CF20 AND 15CF177
 Defendant will not possess any guns or other weapons.  Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.
Defendant Eric  Valadez in court with attorney Travis Schwantes.  Diane M. Donohoo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed.

Defendant Eric  Valadez in court, in custody with attorney Travis Schwantes.  Haley Jo Rea appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is before the Court on the Defendant's Motion to Modify Bond.  Attorney Schwantes advises that the Defendant's Uncle, Adrian Reyes, is a potential co-signer but he is not here today.  Attorney Schwantes asks that the bond be modified to have Mr. Reyes as co-signer with conditions that Mr. Valadez must reside at his Uncle's residence and maintain contact with his Probation Agent and enter the treatment program that his Agent sets up for him.  Argument by Attorney Rea opposing Defendant's motion to modify bond.  Court denies request for bond modification noting that Judge Reddy would want the co-signer present in Court so he could address him directly.  Case remains on as scheduled for status hearing on October 29, 2015 at 1:15 p.m. before Judge Reddy.

Defendant Eric  Valadez in court, in custody with attorney Travis Schwantes.  Tracy L. McMiller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed.  Motion hearing scheduled for August 28, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
Plaintiff's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.  Notice of Motion and Motion for Establishment of Discovery Deadlines.
Not guilty pleas entered

2:33 p.m.  Court in session.  Case called.  Appearances given.  Defendant Eric Valadez in court, in custody with attorney Travis Schwantes.  Haley Jo Rea appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Matter is before the Court for a decision on the Defendant's Motion to dismiss filed in Case 2015CF000020.  This file is tracking.  Court denies the Defendant's Motion for the reasons set forth on the record.  Both cases now need to be scheduled for preliminary hearing.  Minutes filed.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 26, 2015 at 09:30 am.
